A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: After watching the force awakens some 2 years ago now\, I felt hopeful that once again Star Wars was heading in the right direction! The last Jedi has firmly cemented this idea within my heart! A fresh take on a beloved franchise with the idea that after 9 films not everything is as black and white as once was thought! The Jedi aren't all that's good in the galaxy and every character is expendable! A refreshing take and well up there with one of the best Star Wars films to date! All I can say well done Rian Johnson and I can't wait to see episode 9 and the next chapter of this exciting and fresh saga!
